description: Banking OKR API calls and hierarchical structure for Q1 2025

coo_objective.name: Digital Banking Transformation
coo_objective.description: Accelerate digital banking adoption to become the primary channel for customer interactions

key_results.name: Reduce digital onboarding time to 7 minutes

objective.name: Data & Analytics Excellence for Digital Banking
objective.description: Build advanced data capabilities and AI-powered insights to enable personalized digital banking experiences and real-time decision making

key_results.name: Build real-time customer analytics platform
key_results.description: Deploy real-time analytics platform processing 100% of digital transactions within 50ms

key_results.name: Deploy AI fraud detection with 95% accuracy
key_results.description: Implement ML-based fraud detection achieving 95% accuracy with <0.1% false positive rate

key_results.name: Enable personalized insights for 80% customers
key_results.description: Launch AI-driven personalized financial insights reaching 80% of active digital banking users

objective.name: Digital Product Engineering Excellence
objective.description: Deliver exceptional digital banking applications with world-class user experience, seamless omnichannel integration, and rapid feature delivery

key_results.name: Launch redesigned mobile app with 4.5+ rating
key_results.description: Deliver new mobile banking app with enhanced UX achieving 4.5+ star rating on app stores

key_results.name: Streamline digital onboarding to 7 minutes
key_results.description: Redesign and implement frictionless onboarding flow reducing time from 15 to 7 minutes

objective.name: Infrastructure Modernization for Digital Scale
objective.description: Build cloud-native infrastructure that ensures 99.99% uptime, sub-second response times, and bank-grade security for digital banking services

key_results.name: Achieve 99.99% platform uptime
key_results.description: Maintain 99.99% uptime for all digital banking services through resilient cloud infrastructure

key_results.name: Reduce API response time to <200ms
key_results.description: Optimize infrastructure to achieve sub-200ms response time for 95% of API calls

example_payload.name: Digital Banking Transformation
example_payload.description: Accelerate digital banking adoption to become the primary channel for customer interactions

create_objective.notes: For child objectives, include 'Objective': {'Id': parent_id} in additionalFields

example_payload.name: Increase digital transaction volume from 45% to 65%
example_payload.description: Increase digital transaction volume from 45% to 65% of total transactions

update_key_result.limitations: Current Value is a system field that can only be updated by System User or through metrics integrations

entity_types_used: Objective - For OKR objectives at all levels
KeyResult - For measurable key results with Start/Target values
lessons_learned: PortfolioEpic was initially used but Objective/KeyResult entities are the proper types
Custom fields must be set in additionalFields during creation
Current Value is system-managed and cannot be updated via API
Parent objectives are linked via Objective field in additionalFields

digital_transaction_volume.rollup_logic: Weighted average based on channel contribution
